attributes.action: Speed the entry to operational service with the RAF of the Nimrod MRA4 variant
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the recent coroner's report into
the tragic loss of Nimrod MR2 XV230, do
request that the RAF is allowed to significantly speed up the entry into service of the new MRA4 variant to allow the RAF to have a new and world class MR/ISTAR aircraft.
